title: Learn anime
description: Anime (Japanese: IPA: ) is hand-drawn and computer-generated animation originating from Japan. Outside Japan and in English, anime refers specifically to animation produced in Japan. However, in Japan and Japanese, anime (a term derived from a shortening of the English word animation) describes all animated works, regardless of style or origin. Many works of animation with a similar style to Japanese animation are also produced outside Japan. Video games sometimes also feature themes and art styles that can be considered as "anime" in Japan.
metadesc: Anime (Japanese: IPA: ) is hand-drawn and computer-generated animation originating from Japan.
author: Kusal
